text:
Unfortunately high Covid #’s are now baked in for next 2-3 weeks because they reflect infections 7 to 21 days earlier.
Focus now must be getting numbers to plateau & start falling by mid-July & preventing young & healthy people from infecting those older &/or at higher risk
